verses.verse: לִשְׁלֹמֹ֨ה ׀ <WH8010> [A Psalm] for Solomon אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> O God מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶיךָ <WH4941> thy judgments לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king תֵּ֑ן <WH5414> Give וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <WH6666> and thy righteousness לְבֶן־ <WH1121> son מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> unto the king's
יָדִ֣ין <WH1777> He shall judge עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> thy people בְצֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> with righteousness וַעֲנִיֶּ֥יךָ <WH6041> and thy poor בְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> with judgment
יִשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> shall bring הָרִ֓ים <WH2022> The mountains שָׁ֘ל֥וֹם <WH7965> peace לָעָ֑ם <WH5971> to the people וּ֝גְבָע֗וֹת <WH1389> and the little hills בִּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> by righteousness

יִשְׁפֹּ֤ט ׀ <WH8199> He shall judge עֲ‍ֽנִיֵּי־ <WH6041> the poor עָ֗ם <WH5971> of the people י֭וֹשִׁיעַ <WH3467> he shall save לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children אֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> of the needy וִֽידַכֵּ֣א <WH1792> and shall break in pieces עוֹשֵֽׁק׃ <WH6231> the oppressor

יִֽירָא֥וּךָ <WH3372> They shall fear עִם־ <WH5973> thee as long as שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> the sun וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> endure יָ֝רֵ֗חַ <WH3394> and moon דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> throughout all דּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH1755> generations

יֵ֭רֵד <WH3381> He shall come down כְּמָטָ֣ר <WH4306> like rain עַל־ <WH5921> upon גֵּ֑ז <WH1488> upon the mown כִּ֝רְבִיבִ֗ים <WH7241> grass as showers זַרְזִ֥יף <WH2222> [that] water אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

יִֽפְרַח־ <WH6524> flourish בְּיָמָ֥יו <WH3117> In his days צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> shall the righteous וְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> and abundance שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <WH7965> of peace עַד־ <WH5704> till בְּלִ֥י <WH1097> is no יָרֵֽחַ׃ <WH3394> so long as the moon

וְ֭יֵרְדְּ <WH7287> He shall have dominion מִיָּ֣ם <WH3220> also from sea עַד־ <WH5704> against יָ֑ם <WH3220> to sea וּ֝מִנָּהָ֗ר <WH5104> and from the river עַד־ <WH5704> against אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> unto the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

לְ֭פָנָיו <WH6440> before יִכְרְע֣וּ <WH3766> shall bow צִיִּ֑ים <WH6728> They that dwell in the wilderness וְ֝אֹיְבָ֗יו <WH341> him and his enemies עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> the dust יְלַחֵֽכוּ׃ <WH3897> shall lick

מַלְכֵ֬י <WH4428> The kings תַרְשִׁ֣ישׁ <WH8659> of Tarshish וְ֭אִיִּים <WH339> and of the isles מִנְחָ֣ה <WH4503> presents יָשִׁ֑יבוּ <WH7725> shall bring מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> the kings שְׁבָ֥א <WH7614> of Sheba וּ֝סְבָ֗א <WH5434> and Seba אֶשְׁכָּ֥ר <WH814> gifts יַקְרִֽיבוּ׃ <WH7126> shall offer
וְיִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <WH7812> shall fall down ל֥וֹ כָל־ <WH3605> all מְלָכִ֑ים <WH4428> Yea all kings כָּל־ <WH3605> All גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> before him all nations יַֽעַבְדֽוּהוּ׃ <WH5647> shall serve

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יַ֭צִּיל <WH5337> For he shall deliver אֶבְי֣וֹן <WH34> the needy מְשַׁוֵּ֑עַ <WH7768> when he crieth וְ֝עָנִ֗י <WH6041> the poor וְֽאֵין־ <WH369> has עֹזֵ֥ר <WH5826> also and [him] that hath no helper לֽוֹ׃

יָ֭חֹס <WH2347> He shall spare עַל־ <WH5921> on דַּ֣ל <WH1800> the poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> and needy וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹת <WH5315> the souls אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים <WH34> of the needy יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> and shall save

מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8496> from deceit וּ֭מֵחָמָס <WH2555> and violence יִגְאַ֣ל <WH1350> He shall redeem נַפְשָׁ֑ם <WH5315> their soul וְיֵיקַ֖ר <WH3365> and precious דָּמָ֣ם <WH1818> shall their blood בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> be in his sight

וִיחִ֗י <WH2421> And he shall live וְיִתֶּן־ <WH5414> and to him shall be given לוֹ֮ מִזְּהַ֪ב <WH2091> of the gold שְׁ֫בָ֥א <WH7614> of Sheba וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> prayer also shall be made בַּעֲד֣וֹ <WH1157> about תָמִ֑יד <WH8548> for him continually כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> [and] daily יְבָרֲכֶֽנְהֽוּ׃ <WH1288> shall he be praised

יְהִ֤י <WH1961> become פִסַּת־ <WH6451> There shall be an handful בַּ֨ר ׀ <WH1250> of corn בָּאָרֶץ֮ <WH776> in the earth בְּרֹ֪אשׁ <WH7218> upon the top הָ֫רִ֥ים <WH2022> of the mountains יִרְעַ֣שׁ <WH7493> thereof shall shake כַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן <WH3844> like Lebanon פִּרְי֑וֹ <WH6529> the fruit וְיָצִ֥יצוּ <WH6692> shall flourish מֵ֝עִ֗יר <WH5892> and [they] of the city כְּעֵ֣שֶׂב <WH6212> like grass הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

יְהִ֤י <WH1961> endure שְׁמ֨וֹ <WH8034> His name לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> shall endure for ever לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> as long as שֶׁמֶשׁ֮ <WH8121> the sun [יָנִין כ] (יִנֹּ֪ון <WH5125> be continued ק) שְׁ֫מ֥וֹ <WH8034> his name וְיִתְבָּ֥רְכוּ <WH1288> and [men] shall be blessed ב֑וֹ כָּל־ <WH3605> all גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> in him all nations יְאַשְּׁרֽוּהוּ׃ <WH833> shall call him blessed

בָּר֤וּךְ ׀ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel עֹשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> who only doeth נִפְלָא֣וֹת <WH6381> wondrous things לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <WH905> alone

וּבָר֤וּךְ ׀ <WH1288> And blessed שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name כְּבוֹד֗וֹ <WH3519> [be] his glorious לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וְיִמָּלֵ֣א <WH4390> be filled כְ֭בוֹדוֹ <WH3519> [with] his glory אֶת־ <WH853> כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> and may the whole הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> and let the whole earth אָ֘מֵ֥ן ׀ <WH543> Amen וְאָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> and Amen
כָּלּ֥וּ <WH3615> are ended תְפִלּ֑וֹת <WH8605> The prayers דָּ֝וִ֗ד <WH1732> of David בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִשָֽׁי׃ <WH3448> of Jesse
